name: Spidermare
description:
Game entry for the Libgdx October 2019 Game Jam.

You are playing Victor. Outrun the spider for as long as you can. Click to jump. The longer you hold your click, the farther you will jump. How long will you surivive?

Programming, animations, and design by Ahmed (Santorno)

Graphics, sounds, and design by Faris.

Special thanks to Caroline, Victor, Mustapha, Amy, Joy, Lux, Liam, Jade, Abigail.
